description: Details required by Conditions 2 (Construction Management Plan) and 3 (Noise Assessment Report) of permission 22/02123/PAMA (Conversion of the rear ancillary store/showroom from Class E(a) to four self-contained studio flats (Class C3 use) with associated refuse/recycling store and cycle parking)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to Condition 2 (Construction Management Plan) of permission 22/02123/PAMA to safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers and to safeguard highway safety and the free flow of traffic in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: SMKCON Name: Borough Wide Smoke Control Order
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
